definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Finland invested in communications and IT at exactly the right time.
sentences.chinese: 芬兰在通讯和信息技术方面的投资可谓恰逢其时。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the cost of maintaining social order is rising.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，维护社会秩序的成本在上升。

sentences.english: We are now in no way to make any further concession in price.
sentences.chinese: 我们应经无法再在价格方面做出让步了。

sentences.english: In this way,we can develop ourselves in different aspects.
sentences.chinese: 这样我们就可以在不同的方面发展自己。

sentences.english: We need to unleash massive private investment in clean energy.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须在清洁能源方面发动大量的私人投资。

sentences.english: In which of the three areas of membership development do clubs in the district need improvement?
sentences.chinese: 地区内的扶轮社在社员发展的三方面需要改善？

sentences.english: As for whether he will visit the DPRK, I am not aware of such an arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 至于他是否去朝鲜，目前我没有听说有这方面的安排。

sentences.english: The second chapter makes contribution in chemical fiber for Qian Baojun science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 第二章为钱宝钧在化学纤维研究方面的贡献。

sentences.english: I accept there were some judicial mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 的确有一些审判方面的错误。

sentences.english: Britain has fallen behind Japan in shipbuilding.
sentences.chinese: 在造船方面英国已落到日本后头了。

sentences.english: Earthworms play a vital role in food production.
sentences.chinese: 在粮食生产方面，蚯蚓扮演极为重要的作用。

sentences.english: There are two ways to solve supply and demand contradiction.
sentences.chinese: 解决供需矛盾可从两个方面着手，首先是减少需求。

sentences.english: These three factors have a lot of power over your metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 这三个方面就可以对你的代谢产生重要影响。

sentences.english: He had troubles with the very elements of writing.
sentences.chinese: 他在掌握写作的基本要领方面困难重重。

sentences.english: We has carried out systematic studies to characterize the condition inside the shoes in terms of hygienics.
sentences.chinese: 我们在鞋内卫生方面完成了系统研究，并注明了条件。

sentences.english: The artistic achievements of Xiuruji mostly embody two aspects.
sentences.chinese: 《绣襦记》的艺术成就主要体现在两方面。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
apart from this/in addition to this
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
short stave of the barrel (which allows the contents to escape)/(fig.) shortcoming/weak point
